translation.en: You had rations for two weeks.
You were inside for nearly four months.
translation.it: Siete rimaste dentro per due mesi.

translation.en: How long did you think you were inside?
translation.it: Quanto credi di essere rimasta là?
Che è successo a Josie Radek?
- Non lo so. - E a Sheppard?

translation.en: Like all cells, it is born from an existing cell.
translation.it: Come tutte le cellule, si origina da un'altra cellula.

translation.en: all cells were ultimately born from one cell.
translation.it: che tutte le cellule derivano da una singola cellula.

translation.en: A single organism alone on planet Earth,
translation.it: Un singolo organismo, l'unico esistente sul pianeta Terra,
Circa quattro miliardi di anni fa...

translation.en: one became two, two became four.
translation.it: ...da una cellula ne sono nate due e da due quattro.

translation.en: The rhythm of the dividing pair...
which becomes the structure of every microbe,
translation.it: ...forma la base della struttura di ogni microbo,

translation.en: blade of grass, sea creature, land creature...
translation.it: di ogni filo d'erba, di ogni creatura marina e terrestre...

translation.en: The structure of everything that lives...
translation.it: La struttura di ogni essere vivente...

translation.en: As students of medicine, as the doctors of tomorrow,
translation.it: Voi studenti di Medicina siete i medici del futuro,

translation.en: this is where you come in.
The cell we're looking at is from a tumor.
Female patient, early 30s, taken from the cervix.
translation.it: Donna, 30 anni, cellula prelevata dal collo dell'utero.

translation.en: Over the course of the next term,
we will be closely examining cancer cells in vitro
[Katie] I read the John Sulston paper last night.
translation.it: Ho letto l'articolo di John Sulston,

translation.en: I still feel like I'm not working hard enough.

translation.it: Non sono brava come gli altri.

translation.en: -They find everything easier. -[woman] You aren't, and they don't.
translation.it: - Per loro è tutto così facile. - Non è vero.

translation.en: [Dan] I've been looking for you at lunch, but you never seem to be around.
translation.it: Ti ho cercata, a pranzo, ma non ti trovo mai.

translation.en: I've been catching up on some writing.
All work and no play, it sounds... not healthy.
translation.it: Non fai che lavorare... non ti fa bene.

translation.en: Sarah and I have a few people over.
translation.it: Sarah e io faremo una festa in giardino.

translation.en: A garden party while the weather holds.
Thanks, Dan, I really appreciate it, but I'm going to paint our bedr--
translation.it: Grazie, Dan, davvero, ma devo ridipingere la nostra...

translation.en: You're allowed to come to a barbecue. It is not a betrayal
translation.it: Puoi venire a un barbecue. Non significherebbe calpestare il suo ricordo.

translation.en: or an insult to his memory.
translation.it: Non significherebbe calpestare il suo ricordo.

translation.en: -♪ Confusion has its cost ♪ -Oh, my God. Oh, my God!
-♪ Who lingers ♪ -Oh, my God. I thought you were gone. ♪ Saying she is lost ♪
No one knew anything about your unit. I contacted everyone.
translation.it: Nessuno sapeva niente della tua unità. Ho contattato tutti.

translation.en: The other partners knew just as little as me.
translation.it: Le altre mogli ne sapevano quanto me.

translation.en: Okay, yeah, it was covert. Yeah, I think so.
translation.it: Ok, sì, lo era. Credo fosse segreta.

translation.en: I-- I don't know where it was, or...
translation.it: Io non... non so dove fosse o...

translation.en: How is that possible? [stammers] Was it warm?
Did the people there speak Portuguese, or Swahili, or Pashto?
translation.it: La gente del posto parlava portoghese, swahili o pashto?

translation.en: How long have you been back?
How'd you get back? What base did you fly into?
-I don't know. -Your unit, did they come back with you?
translation.it: Non lo so. E gli altri? Sono rientrati con te?

translation.en: You must be able to tell me something.
You vanished off the face of the earth for 12 months.
translation.it: Sei scomparso nel nulla per 12 mesi.

translation.en: I deserve a better explanation than no explanation.
No, I was outside the room.
Stay with me, baby. -[coughing] -I'm right here with you.
translation.it: Resta con me, amore. Sono qui insieme a te.

translation.en: Stay with me, baby. I love you.
translation.it: Resta con me, tesoro. Ti amo.

translation.en: Baby, look at me. Can you do something?!
[paramedic] You call for a police escort?
[paramedic] What are you doing? You can't move him!
Let him go! Let him go!
It's a hangover from the sedative you were given.
translation.it: Sono gli effetti del sedativo che le hanno dato.

translation.en: Why am I talking to a psychologist?
translation.it: Perché devo parlare con una psicologa?

translation.en: Am I in a psychiatric hospital?
You served in the military for seven years.
translation.it: È stata nell'esercito per sette anni.

translation.en: I'm a professor from Johns Hopkins.
translation.it: Sono una professoressa alla Johns Hopkins.

translation.en: I want to know what the fuck I'm doing here.
translation.it: E voglio sapere che cazzo ci faccio qui.

translation.en: Your research area is the genetically programmed life cycle of a cell.
translation.it: La sua ricerca si occupa di come alterare il ciclo vitale delle cellule.

translation.en: Yeah, I'd like to talk about Sergeant Kane.
When did he arrive back home?
-I want to see a lawyer. -You're not gonna be able to.
translation.it: - Voglio vedere un avvocato. - Non sarà possibile.

translation.en: Did he explain how he got back?
-No. -Did he contact you at any point while he was away?
translation.it: L'ha mai contattata, durante la sua assenza?

translation.en: [Ventress] What did he tell you about his mission when he returned?
translation.it: Una volta tornato, cosa le ha detto della missione?

translation.en: Did he ever mention where he was going, what he was doing?
translation.it: Le ha detto dove sarebbe andato e perché?

translation.en: He never said, I never asked.
translation.it: No. E io non gliel'ho chiesto.

translation.en: But you made regular requests for information from his unit CO.
translation.it: Eppure ha richiesto informazioni al comando della sua unità.

translation.en: Until six months ago, and then you stopped.
translation.it: Fino a sei mesi fa. Poi ha smesso.

translation.en: Why was that? Thought he was dead?
It's not easy to move on.
I'm done answering questions. It's your turn.
translation.it: Non dirò altro. Ora tocca a lei, parlare.

translation.en: He must have been exposed to some sort of radiation,
translation.it: Dev'essere stato esposto a radiazioni di qualche tipo

translation.en: You have to tell me where he was, what he was doing.
translation.it: Mi dica dov'è andato e a cosa lavorava.

translation.en: It started around three years ago.
translation.it: Tutto è iniziato tre anni fa.

translation.en: Blackwater National Park reported that a lighthouse was surrounded
translation.it: Un faro al Blackwater National Park si è ritrovato nel mezzo
di ciò che è stato definito "Bagliore".

translation.en: One of the wardens went in to investigate.
translation.it: Uno dei guardiani è andato a dare un'occhiata.

translation.en: Since then, we've approached by land, by sea,
translation.it: Abbiamo tentato di avvicinarci via terra, mare,

translation.en: sent in drones, animals, and teams of people.
translation.it: inviato dei droni, animali e delle squadre.

translation.en: And the boundary's getting bigger. It's expanding.
translation.it: E il fenomeno continua a espandersi.

translation.en: So far, it's eating into barely populated swampland,
translation.it: Per ora ha inglobato solo zone paludose

translation.en: which, you know, we evacuated under the pretext of a chemical spill,
translation.it: che, come saprà, abbiamo fatto evacuare con la scusa di un incidente chimico,

translation.en: but... that won't last much longer.
translation.it: ma siamo a corto di tempo.

translation.en: In a few months, the area will have grown to where we are right now.
translation.it: Nel giro di mesi, la zona si espanderà fino all'edificio in cui ci troviamo.
Ha detto che nessuno fa ritorno.

translation.en: We need to come to an agreement about what to do with you.
translation.it: Dobbiamo concordare con lei la procedura da seguire.

translation.en: You're not going to let me go home?
translation.it: Non mi lasciate andare a casa?

translation.en: Is that what you want? To go home?
translation.it: È questo che vuole? Andare a casa?

translation.en: I want to be with him.
I was just looking at the moon.
It's always so weird seeing it like that in the daylight.
translation.it: È strano vedere la luna di giorno.
Come se Dio avesse lasciato per errore...

translation.en: somewhat key to the whole "being a god" thing.
You know he's listening right now, don't you?
translation.it: Lo sai che ti ascolta, vero?

translation.en: circumvent the Hayflick limit, you can prevent senescence.
translation.it: e aggiri il limite di Hayflick, previeni l'invecchiamento.

translation.en: I was about to make the exact same point.
translation.it: Stavo per dire la stessa cosa.

translation.en: It means the cell doesn't grow old, it becomes immortal.
translation.it: La cellula non invecchia più, diventa immortale.

translation.en: They say aging is a natural process, but it's actually a fault in our genes.
translation.it: L'invecchiamento non è un processo naturale, ma un errore genetico.

translation.en: I get really turned on when you patronize me. It's really hot.
translation.it: Mi ecciti quando mi parli come se fossi stupido.

translation.en: Without it, I could keep looking like this forever.
Oh, okay. -Well, that could constitute a mistake. -[laughs]
You didn't tell me where you're heading this time.
translation.it: Non mi hai detto dove ti mandano.

translation.en: I know there's something strange about this mission.
translation.it: So che non è una missione come le altre.

translation.en: The silence around it is louder than usual.
translation.it: Tengono tutto sotto silenzio, molto più del solito.

translation.en: Kind of angling for a clue here.
translation.it: Non mi dai neanche un indizio?

translation.en: We'll be under the same hemisphere.
It tells you that if you step outside and you look up...
translation.it: Beh, almeno sai che se alzi lo sguardo...

translation.en: we'll be looking at the same stars.
You think that's what I do while you're away?
translation.it: Secondo te non faccio altro, quando sei via?

translation.en: -What? -You think I'm out in the garden,
translation.it: - Cosa? - Pensi che me ne stia in giardino,

translation.en: pining, looking up at the sky?
translation.it: a piangere e a fissare le stelle?

translation.en: -[scoffs] Shut up. All right. -Oh, to think my beloved Kane...
translation.it: - Dai, piantala. - Oh, chissà dov'è... - ...il mio amato Kane... - Ok.

translation.en: -Okay. Uh-huh. -...is looking at the selfsame moon.
translation.it: - ...il mio amato Kane... - Ok. Starà guardando la mia stessa luna?

translation.en: Jesus. You know what? You are disrespectful,
seriously, not only to your former comrades in the armed forces,
translation.it: non solo ai tuoi ex commilitoni nell'esercito,

translation.en: -but also to the president. -You forgot the flag.
translation.it: - ma al Presidente. - E alla bandiera.

translation.en: Oh, I'm getting-- I'm getting to the motherfucking flag.
translation.it: Ora vado a prendere anche la bandiera, cazzo.

translation.en: [woman] She's all by herself. Don't you think we should make friends?
translation.it: È sempre da sola. Non dovremmo provare a coinvolgerla?

translation.en: -[woman 2] Well, obviously you should. -[woman] Yep, I'll do it.
You know, I always see you here alone. It's...
translation.it: Sai, ti vedo sempre da sola e....

translation.en: I'm guessing you probably feel weird or awkward.
translation.it: Non so, magari ti senti a disagio.
Beh, non ce n'è bisogno, sul serio.

translation.en: The people here put themselves to sleep in the fetal position
translation.it: Qui la gente si addormenta in posizione fetale

translation.en: Um, why don't you come and meet my crew?
[Lena and woman] Hi nice to meet you.
Yeah, that's Cassie Sheppard, and Josie Radek.
translation.it: Loro sono Cassie Sheppard e Josie Radek.

translation.en: -[Cassie] Do you want to have a seat? -Thank you.
-So, first day at the Southern Reach. -Yes.
translation.it: - Primo giorno alla Southern Reach? - Sì.

translation.en: Um, yeah, right from the start.
I've been testing the magnetic fields around the boundary,
translation.it: Sto testando i campi magnetici intorno al confine,

translation.en: which is like using confetti to test a hurricane.
translation.it: è un po' come usare coriandoli per testare un uragano.

translation.en: Uh, and I've been here... ten months.
translation.it: Io sono qui da dieci mesi.

translation.en: Tried to join an NGO, but my application got flagged,
translation.it: Volevo lavorare per una ONG, ma non è andata.

translation.en: Only two months. I'm a physicist.
translation.it: Io sono qui da due mesi. Ho appena finito un dottorato in fisica a Cambridge.

translation.en: I came straight from my Cambridge postdoc.
translation.it: Ho appena finito un dottorato in fisica a Cambridge.

translation.en: Uh, I'm from Johns Hopkins, biologist.
We had a bet on your profession, and Josie had biologist, of course.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto una scommessa e Josie ha optato per una biologa.

translation.en: -I had law enforcement. -I had you as single.
translation.it: - Io ho scommesso su un poliziotto. - Io che eri single.

translation.en: Jesus. Do you have to hit on everyone, like all the time?
translation.it: Cristo. Ma devi provarci sempre con tutte?

translation.en: Fuck that. Under the circumstances, I think I'm allowed to roll the dice a few more times. [chuckles]
translation.it: 'Fanculo. Date le circostanze, direi che mi è concesso.

translation.en: Well, yeah, um, crazy as it seems...
translation.it: Beh, per quanto possa sembrare assurdo...

translation.en: -You're going into the Shimmer? -Six days and counting.
translation.it: - Nel Bagliore? - Sì, fra sei giorni.
La dr.ssa Ventress? È la caposquadra.

translation.en: The previous teams have been largely military, so, yeah.
translation.it: Le squadre precedenti erano perlopiù militari...

translation.en: What do you think happened to them?
translation.it: Che ne è stato di loro?

translation.en: Well, there are two theories of what went wrong in the Shimmer.
translation.it: Ci sono due teorie per spiegare cosa sia andato storto.

translation.en: Two, they go crazy and kill each other.
translation.it: O sono impazziti e si sono uccisi fra loro.

translation.en: [Josie] There was one military guy who made it out.
translation.it: Un soldato è riuscito a tornare.

translation.en: Yeah, but you heard about the state that he was in.
translation.it: Ma sapete in che stato è ridotto.

translation.en: I know why you went in.
And I know what I have to do.
[Ventress] So you didn't tell them about your connection to Sergeant Kane?
translation.it: Non ha detto loro che il sergente Kane è suo marito?

translation.en: [Lena] I thought it would complicate things.
Why are you going into the Shimmer?
The mission statement is to reach the supposed source of the Shimmer,
translation.it: Lo scopo della missione è di raggiungere la presunta fonte del Bagliore, il faro,

translation.en: the lighthouse, enter and acquire data, and return.
translation.it: la presunta fonte del Bagliore, il faro, entrarvi, raccogliere dati e tornare qui.

translation.en: But I don't think that that's your mission statement.
translation.it: Ma non credo che sia questo il suo scopo.

translation.en: I've been watching the phenomenon for a while now.
translation.it: È da un po' che osservo questo fenomeno.
Osservo il Bagliore che si avvicina.

translation.en: There's only so long one can do that.
translation.it: Non lo si può fare in eterno.

translation.en: But you need to know what's inside?
You want to come with us.
I can't do anything for him here.
You requested to join the mission.
translation.it: Ha chiesto di unirsi alla missione

translation.en: You knew all other missions had failed
translation.it: pur sapendo che le altre avevano fallito

translation.en: and the only survivor was barely surviving.
translation.it: e l'unico a tornare era in punto di morte.

translation.en: I'm only trying to understand what drove you.
translation.it: Cerco di capire le sue motivazioni.

translation.en: [Anya] And then we get some real meals.

translation.it: Degli spaghetti. Ci sono i cracker vegetali di Radek.

translation.en: Wow, cornbread. That's not so bad.
translation.it: Farina di mais. Non fa poi così schifo.

translation.en: You gotta give me a second. I'm a little disoriented.
translation.it: Datemi un secondo, mi sento disorientata.

translation.en: You don't remember setting up camp, do you?
translation.it: Non ricordi che ci siamo accampate?

translation.en: I don't remember anything... after we reached the tree line.
translation.it: Non ricordo nulla... dopo aver superato gli alberi.

translation.en: And we did a food inventory.
From the depletion, we've been out here for at least three or four days.
translation.it: da quanto è stato consumato direi che siamo qui da tre o quattro giorni.

translation.en: Guys, I've been checking my comms and nav equipment.
translation.it: Ho controllato le attrezzature radio e il GPS.

translation.en: They boot up fine, no problem with the electronics, and the camera is working,
translation.it: Gli strumenti sono a posto e anche la macchina fotografica,

translation.en: but anything that sends a signal out of the Shimmer... is down.
translation.it: ma è impossibile inviare un segnale all'esterno.

translation.en: Even though we've probably got about 20 satellites above us right now,
translation.it: Anche se sopra di noi ci saranno una ventina di satelliti...
Anche se sopra di noi ci saranno una ventina di satelliti... E poi guardate qua.

translation.en: So we've got no compass, no comms, no coordinates...
translation.it: Allora, siamo senza bussola, senza radio né coordinate

translation.en: Well, we know we're in the state park.
translation.it: Beh, sappiamo di essere nel parco.

translation.en: We head south, we hit the ocean,
then we can just follow the shoreline until we hit the perimeter wall. Right?
translation.it: e da lì possiamo seguire la costa fino a raggiungere il muro perimetrale.

translation.en: -How do we know what's south? -Come on, Josie, you know this.
translation.it: - Come capiamo dov'è il sud? - Dai!
Lancetta delle ore verso il sole.

translation.en: Split the difference between the hour hand and 12, south.
translation.it: Il sud è a metà tra la lancetta e il numero 12.

translation.en: We weren't really expecting the comms equipment to work, were we?
translation.it: Non speravamo davvero che la radio funzionasse, eh?

translation.en: There's been three years of expeditions and three years of radio silence.
translation.it: Sono tre anni che mandano gente e nessuno l'ha mai usata.

translation.en: Let's pack up and get moving.
We've already lost a lot of the day.
[Anya] Oh, I'm gonna check this out. Get us out of this damn swamp.
translation.it: Guardate qui. Magari ci servirà per andarcene.

translation.en: [Ventress] All right. Let's check out the hut.
Looks like someone's about to have a wedding.
translation.it: Sembra che ci sarà un matrimonio.

translation.en: To look at them, you wouldn't say that they're the same species.
translation.it: Non sembrano nemmeno essere della stessa specie.

translation.en: But they're growing from the same branch structure...
translation.it: Ma crescono tutti dagli stessi rami....

translation.en: so it has to be the same species.
It's like they're stuck in a continuous mutation.
translation.it: Sembra una sorta di mutazione continua.

translation.en: you'd sure as hell call it a pathology if you saw this in a human.
translation.it: Se si trattasse di un essere umano, la chiamerei così, sì.

translation.en: No. It's been long abandoned, maybe even before--
translation.it: No, è abbandonato da un pezzo, forse da prima...
Qualcosa mi ha preso lo zaino!

translation.en: -[Lena] Help me with her! -[Anya] What's going on?
[Anya] Let's sit you down. Help me with her bag.
translation.it: Mettiti seduta. Aiutami con lo zaino.

translation.en: Okay, just breathe. It's okay. You're just fine.
translation.it: Ora respira, brava. Va tutto bene.

translation.en: -What the hell happened? -Something in the water.
It's exactly the same as the flowers.
translation.it: È la stessa cosa dei fiori.

translation.en: Something here is making giant waves in the gene pool.
translation.it: C'è qualcosa che incasina il pool genetico.

translation.en: Sharks have teeth like that, don't they?
Do you think it's a crossbreed?
You can't crossbreed between different species.
translation.it: Non si possono incrociare specie diverse.

translation.en: The mutations were subtle at first.
More extreme as we grew closer to the lighthouse.
translation.it: Sono diventate più estreme più ci avvicinavamo al faro.

translation.en: Is it possible these were hallucinations?
But they were shared among all of us.
[clicks tongue] Must have gotten that from the gator.
So, where'd you learn to shoot?
I was in the military before I was an academic.
translation.it: Facevo altro, prima di passare alla ricerca.

translation.en: Feels like a lifetime ago now.
All other lives feel like a lifetime ago.
translation.it: Sembra la vita di un altro.

translation.en: We were kids, I was married.
Which do you carry around your neck? A husband or a child?
translation.it: Tu cos'hai nel tuo passato? Avevi un marito? Dei figli?

translation.en: He was in the army, too. That's...
Guess there had to be something.
It's not exactly something you do if your life is in... perfect harmony.
translation.it: Non prendi una decisione simile se hai... una vita perfetta.

translation.en: 'cause she doesn't want you to see the scars on her forearms.
translation.it: per nascondere le cicatrici sulle braccia.

translation.en: No, I think the opposite, trying to feel alive.
Yeah. As far as anyone knows...
no friends, no family, no partner, no children.
translation.it: Non ha amici, né figli, né famiglia.

translation.en: No concession in her at all.

translation.it: E tu? Anch'io ho perso qualcuno.

translation.en: In a way, it's two bereavements.
translation.it: È come se avessi perso due persone.

translation.en: and the person I once was.
This used to be the headquarters of the Southern Reach.
translation.it: Era la sede della Southern Reach.

translation.en: Is that the old mess hall?
There's beds and bags. You think people are here?
translation.it: Ci sono dei letti e degli zaini. Ci sarà qualcun altro?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna go with the past tense.
translation.it: Direi che il passato è d'obbligo.

translation.en: This shit is heavy. Can't carry this.
Lena, what you got going on?
Those were the soldiers on the last expedition.
Looks like they were using this room as their base of operations.
translation.it: Questa sarà stata la loro base operativa.

translation.en: Why are some of the names crossed out?
Let's not jump to conclusions. -I don't know, maybe we should. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Non saltiamo a conclusioni affrettate. - Forse dovremmo.

translation.en: -This is a plan view of the base, right? -[Cassie] Yep. This is the mess hall.
translation.it: Questa è la planimetria della base? - Qui c'è la mensa. - Questo edificio?
- Qui c'è la mensa. - Questo edificio?

translation.en: I think that the times by the names are a guard rota, so...
translation.it: Forse quei numeri indicano i turni di guardia.

translation.en: if they were guarding the perimeter, we should. -[Anya] Copy that. -[Cassie] Yep.
translation.it: - Dovremmo fare la guardia anche noi. - Ricevuto.

translation.en: This might be able to tell us something.
I should be able to play this.
Okay, so we know what happened to the last group. They went insane.
translation.it: Ok, quelli dell'ultima spedizione sono impazziti.
- Aveva qualcosa di vivo, dentro. - No.

translation.en: -That was a trick of the light. -[Cassie] What?
[Anya] I've been a paramedic for 10 years. I've scraped people off the road.
translation.it: Ho fatto il paramedico per anni. Ho soccorso gente spappolata.

translation.en: You see some weird shit. That was a trick of the light.
translation.it: A volte gli occhi t'ingannano. Era un effetto ottico.

translation.en: -[Josie] His insides were moving. -[Anya] No, it was shock.
translation.it: - Le sue interiora si muovevano. - Era lo shock.

translation.en: -That was a shock response. -[Cassie] Watch it again.
[Anya] No, I'm not gonna watch it again!
[Cassie] That was not intestines. It was a worm--
translation.it: - Col cazzo! - Non era l'intestino. - Sembrava un parassita o... - Guardalo tu, Sheppard!

translation.en: [Anya] Okay, then you watch it, Sheppard!
translation.it: - Sembrava un parassita o... - Guardalo tu, Sheppard!

translation.en: -I don't want to stay here tonight. -We don't have a choice.
translation.it: - Non voglio dormire qui. - Non abbiamo scelta.

translation.en: It's too late in the day for us to move on.
translation.it: È troppo tardi, non possiamo spostarci.

translation.en: I gotta leave a day early.
But we had a whole day planned.
-We were gonna drive to the country-- -No, we can't.
translation.it: - La gita in campagna... - Non posso.

translation.en: It's good Josie's getting some rest.
With the help of a little sedative.
How about you? Get some sleep?
I'm at least as freaked as Josie.

translation.it: Solo che faccio finta di nulla.

translation.en: What're you doing up? Not supposed to relieve me until 3:00.
translation.it: Che fai? Devi darmi il cambio alle tre.

translation.en: I'm done sleeping for the night.
Okay, this is where we are...
It's a small community we evacuated two years ago.
translation.it: una piccola comunità evacuata due anni fa.

translation.en: I think we should head there tomorrow,
and then head out for the coast the following morning.
translation.it: E il giorno dopo continueremo verso la costa.

translation.en: you didn't tell the team about your connection to Kane,
translation.it: Quando non hai detto di Kane,

translation.en: I wasn't sure if that was a good idea.
translation.it: non sapevo se era la cosa giusta.
Ma dopo aver visto quel video...

translation.en: I'm not sure how they would have reacted to you.
Why did my husband volunteer for a suicide mission?
translation.it: Perché Kane si è offerto per una missione suicida?

translation.en: Is that what you think we're doing?
-Committing suicide? -You must have profiled him, you must have assessed him.
translation.it: - Un suicidio? - L'avrai esaminato. E valutato.

translation.en: So you're asking me as a psychologist.
I'd say you're confusing suicide with self-destruction.
translation.it: ...di non confondere il suicidio con l'autodistruzione.

translation.en: Almost none of us commit suicide...
and almost all of us self-destruct.
translation.it: ma gran parte di noi si autodistrugge.

translation.en: In some way, in some part of our lives.

translation.it: Mandiamo alla malora un buon lavoro.

translation.en: In fact, you're probably better equipped to explain this than I am.
translation.it: E forse sei più qualificata tu di me - per spiegarli. - Come?
L'autodistruzione non fa parte del DNA?

translation.en: Wake up, Josie, come on. Wake up. Something's happening.
[Cassie] What happened? I heard a noise.
-Through the fence? -It's ripped open like a fucking zipper.
translation.it: - Come? - L'ha fatta a pezzi come niente.

translation.en: Sheppard was next to me. Something took her.
-[Cassie continues screaming] -Oh, fuck! Oh, fuck! Sheppard!
-We have to go back now. -[Anya] She's right.
-[sighs] -[Anya] We lost one of our own.
We have evidence the previous team went nuts and chopped each other up.
translation.it: Quelli che ci hanno preceduto si sono squartati a vicenda.

translation.en: I really don't know how much more right she has to be.
translation.it: Mi pare ovvio che ha ragione.

translation.en: We still don't understand the cause or the nature of the Shimmer.
translation.it: Non sappiamo quale sia la natura del Bagliore.

translation.en: We have data, observations, photographs. She has hella footage.
translation.it: Abbiamo un sacco di dati e foto. E riprese.

translation.en: All of which makes the phenomenon less explicable, not more.
translation.it: Il che rende questo fenomeno ancora più misterioso.

translation.en: I'm gonna get to the lighthouse,
and I'm fine going on my own.
You just need to decide... whether you're coming with me or not.
translation.it: Sta a voi decidere... se venire con me o no.

translation.en: It's like she hasn't noticed that Sheppard is dead.
translation.it: Ma l'ha capito che Sheppard è morta?

translation.en: You know, and thanks for the fucking backup, Lena.
-I didn't realize there were sides. -[Anya] Yeah.
Okay, then I agree with you. We should go back.
translation.it: Allora sto con te. Dovremmo tornare indietro.

translation.en: Good. Okay, great. There we go. Okay?
-So the three of us can-- -[Lena] Hold on a minute.
But it took us, what, six days to get here?
translation.it: Ma ci sono voluti sei giorni per arrivare qui.

translation.en: And the coast is two days away.
translation.it: E la costa è a due giorni di cammino.

translation.en: when we get to the coast, we can follow it until the perimeter wall.
translation.it: ...ci arriviamo e la seguiamo fino al muro perimetrale.

translation.en: You're saying we get out by going deeper?
translation.it: Per tornare indietro dobbiamo andare avanti?

translation.en: This isn't some bullshit tactic to get us to the lighthouse, is it?
translation.it: Non vorrai fregarci per farci arrivare al faro?

translation.en: This is not about the lighthouse, okay?
I believe that the coast is the best route out.
I didn't know what going back meant.
translation.it: Non sapevo cosa volesse dire tornare indietro.

translation.en: Why it would be safer than going forward.
translation.it: Né se sarebbe stato più sicuro.

translation.en: [man] You didn't know, but you made a decision to continue as if you did.
translation.it: No, ma hai deciso di andare avanti comunque.

translation.en: [man] Ventress had cancer. She was never coming back.
translation.it: Aveva un tumore, sapeva che non sarebbe tornata.

translation.en: Fine. Just... leave me the fuck alone.
translation.it: Sì... ma lasciami in pace, cazzo.

translation.en: It's another two hours' walk up the coast.
At first I thought the radio waves were blocked by the Shimmer,
translation.it: Credevo che il Bagliore bloccasse la radio

translation.en: and that's why no one inside could communicate with base or GPS,
translation.it: e impedisse agli altri di comunicare con la base,

translation.en: but the light waves aren't blocked, they're refracted, and...
translation.it: ma le onde luminose vengono rifratte, non bloccate. E...
Lo stesso vale per le onde radio.

translation.en: know what you'd get if you sequenced it?
translation.it: Sai che tipo di DNA contiene?

translation.en: Hox? What is-- What's Hox mean?
They're the genes that define the body plan, the physical structure.
translation.it: Sono dei geni che definiscono la morfogenesi.

translation.en: And the plants have human body plan.
Arms attached to shoulders. Legs to hips.
translation.it: Braccia fissate alle spalle. Gambe fissate al bacino.

translation.en: The Shimmer is a prism, but it refracts everything.
translation.it: Il Bagliore è una prigione che rifrange ogni segnale,

translation.en: Not just light and radio waves.
translation.it: non solo luce e onde radio.

translation.en: All right... I guess this is a bedroom.
translation.it: Questa dev'essere la stanza da letto.

translation.en: You spend more time away from your husband than with him.
translation.it: Voi passate più tempo lontani che insieme.

translation.en: You can't talk to him about work, and he won't talk to you about his.
translation.it: Non parli con lui di lavoro e lui non ti parla del suo.

translation.en: And there is a clear physical and intellectual connection between us.
translation.it: Fra noi c'è una forte intesa fisica e intellettuale.

translation.en: -Have I covered the bases? -You forgot your wife.
translation.it: Mi sbaglio? - Hai tralasciato tua moglie. - La amo.
- Hai tralasciato tua moglie. - La amo.

translation.en: You think that something may have happened to him?
You think somehow he's found out about our affair.
translation.it: Credi che abbia scoperto di noi due.
È meglio se te ne vai.

translation.en: I'm not interested in talking... or in anything you have to say.
translation.it: Non ho voglia di parlare... né di starti a sentire.

translation.en: Just get dressed and get out.
You know, it's not me you hate, it's yourself.
translation.it: Non è me che odi, ma te stessa.

translation.en: You don't get to ask that fucking question. You answer it!
translation.it: Tu non fai domande, cazzo. Tu devi rispondere!

translation.en: -[Anya] Why didn't you tell us? -[speaks indistinctly]
There are two theories of what went wrong.
translation.it: Ci sono due teorie a proposito del Bagliore.

translation.en: One is that something in here killed them.
Two... is that they went crazy and they killed each other.
translation.it: Oppure sono impazziti e si sono uccisi a vicenda.

translation.en: Josie nearly got killed by an alligator,
translation.it: Josie è stata attaccata da un alligatore

translation.en: and Cass did get killed by a bear. [voice breaks]
translation.it: e Cass è stata uccisa da un orso.

translation.en: So, yes, theory one, it fits.
translation.it: La prima teoria sembra più probabile.

translation.en: I didn't actually see a bear.
translation.it: Io non ho visto nessun orso.

translation.en: [Anya] The only people who saw were Lena and Ventress.
translation.it: Lo hanno visto solo Lena e Ventress.

translation.en: So nothing's confirmed. Everything's on their word.
translation.it: È tutto un po' vago. Ci siamo fidate di loro. Ci siamo fidate di Lena.
Ci siamo fidate di loro. Ci siamo fidate di Lena.

translation.en: is that Lena... is a liar.
Or do you think I've lost my shit and we're gonna fuck each other up?
translation.it: O sono impazzita io e ci faremo a pezzi?

translation.en: When I look at my hands...
and you tie me to a chair and cut me open...
translation.it: e tu mi leghi a una sedia e mi squarti...

translation.en: are my insides gonna move like my fingerprints?
translation.it: Le mie interiora si muoveranno come le mie impronte digitali?

translation.en: But... I'm not the one tied to a chair.
translation.it: Ma non sono io quella legata.

translation.en: -You said she was dead. -[Lena speaks indistinctly]
[in Cassie's voice] Help me! Help me!
-It's not even light yet. -I don't have time to wait.
translation.it: - È ancora buio. - Non posso aspettare.

translation.en: Our bodies as fast as our minds. Can't you feel it?
translation.it: Nel corpo e nella mente. Non lo vedi?

translation.en: It's like the onset of dementia.
translation.it: È una sorta di demenza senile.

translation.en: If I don't reach the lighthouse soon...
the person that started this journey won't be the person that ends it.
translation.it: ...non sarò più la stessa persona che ero all'inizio.

translation.en: I want to be the one that ends it.
How long was your husband in the Shimmer?
translation.it: Quanto è rimasto tuo marito nel Bagliore?

translation.en: Theoretically, as long as a year.
That's a long time to be inside and remain intact.
translation.it: Così tanto? E ne è uscito indenne?

translation.en: I'm not so sure he was intact.
I checked my blood last night.
It will be in all of us.
Sheppard's voice in the mouth of that creature last night.
translation.it: ...la voce di Sheppard in quella creatura.

translation.en: I think as she was dying, part of her mind became...
translation.it: Mentre lei moriva, è come se la sua mente fosse...

translation.en: part of the creature that was killing her.
translation.it: ...diventata parte di ciò che la uccideva.

translation.en: Imagine dying frightened and in pain,
translation.it: È morta in preda al dolore e alla paura

translation.en: and having that as the only part of you which survives.
translation.it: e quella è l'unica parte di lei che è sopravvissuta.

translation.en: I wouldn't like that at all.
But I don't think I want either of those things.
translation.it: Ma io non voglio nessuna delle due cose.

translation.en: One by one, all gone, except you.
translation.it: Se ne sono andate tutte, una ad una. Tranne lei.

translation.en: Is it something I need to explain?
I'm not sure any of them did.
♪ You'll see something certain To tell you ♪
translation.it: IL FARO LA VITA IMMORTALE DI HENRIETTA LACKS

translation.en: I thought I was a man.
And now I'm not so sure.
translation.it: Ma ora non lo so più.

translation.en: If I wasn't Kane, what was I?
translation.it: Se non ero Kane, chi ero?

translation.en: You ever seen a phosphorus grenade go off? They're kind of bright.
translation.it: Hai mai visto una granata al fosforo? Brillano.

translation.en: If you ever get out of here, you find Lena.
translation.it: Se riesci a uscire di qui, trova Lena.

translation.en: That I needed to know what was inside the lighthouse.
translation.it: Che dovevo sapere cosa c'è dentro al faro.
Cosa... cosa c'è dentro di te?

translation.en: I don't know what it wants.
will be fragmented into their smallest parts until...
translation.it: si frammenteranno in pezzi minuscoli finché... non ne resterà nessuno.
Era a base di carbonio o...

translation.en: I don't think it wanted anything.
I'm not sure it even knew I was there.
translation.it: Forse non sapeva neanche che c'ero.

translation.en: It came here for a reason.
translation.it: È venuto qui per un motivo.

translation.en: It was mutating our environment, it was destroying everything.
translation.it: Stava mutando il nostro ambiente e distruggendo ogni cosa.

translation.en: A team reached the lighthouse a few hours ago.
translation.it: Qualche ora fa, una squadra ha raggiunto il faro.

translation.en: If what you encountered was once alive...
translation.it: Se vi siete imbattute in un essere vivente...

translation.en: Now will you tell me what happened to my husband?
translation.it: Adesso mi dirà cos'è successo a mio marito?

translation.en: his blood pressure stabilized and his pulse rate started to rise.
translation.it: la sua pressione si è stabilizzata e il battito è risalito.

translation.en: A few hours later, he was not only awake,
translation.it: Nel giro di poche ore era cosciente
